text: Lindon Oscar Crow (April 4, 1933 - October 25, 2018) was an American football cornerback. == Biography == He played professionally in the National Football League. He was named to three Pro Bowls. He was born in Denison, Texas. Crow played for the New York Giants and the Los Angeles Rams. Crow died on October 25, 2018 in Exeter, California from complications of a stroke at the age of 85.Lindon Crow, veteran of NFL's 'greatest game ever,' dies at 85 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American football cornerbacks Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Los Angeles Rams players Category:New York Giants players Category:People from Denison, Texas Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Lindon Crow
